component.name: Saber: Handwritten Notes
component.summary: A cross-platform libre handwritten notes app.

description.p: A cross-platform libre handwritten notes app, available for Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, and the web!

ul.li: Fixed regression where the 3rd page couldn't be drawn on
Fixed bug on desktops where pages would incorrectly be calculated as offscreen
There's now a button to use the editor in fullscreen
Undo/redo history is now limited to 100 records
Fix bug with new notes all having the same name
Invertible pictures won't be shown not-inverted while loading
Reduced stutter while opening large files
Performance improvements for notes with many pages
Pages in the editor now have a box shadow to make them stand out from the background
You can now type in notes!

ol.li: Better transition when opening a note
You can now choose custom colors in the editor
If you've chosen to auto-clear the whiteboard, you can tap the undo button to restore it
Minor UI tweaks
Added missing dependencies to the Flatpak release
Greatly reduced scrolling jank
Inverted images are now pre-loaded and nicely animated
You can now download images into your gallery/hard drive
Fixed transition from old secure storage
Fixed bug with computers with multiple disks/partitions
Security fix for how your credentials are stored on your device.
The home screen will now show thumbnails of images to reduce memory usage.
Renaming a file to an existing file's name won't overwrite the existing file.
The iOS/macOS icon is now properly cropped.
New users will get a hint to drag the pen size indicator left and right.
Minor bug fixes
You can now automatically clear the whiteboard after you close the app
There's now an FAQ section in the login page
You won't be prompted to rename new notes anymore unless you opt-in in Settings
The Settings page shows how much storage you have left
Fix more login bugs :p
Various performance improvements
You can now change the highlighter size
Bug fix: You can again create/draw on new notes
Bug fix: Syncing now works if you logged in with an email
Bug fix: Saber now correctly responds to (low-priority) available updates
Pen properties are now saved
You'll be warned before editing a note edited/created with a newer version of Saber
Toolbar buttons now wrap instead of scroll on small screens
Fix crash when resizing large photos
Various misc improvements
You can change the height of each line if you use patterned paper backgrounds
New notes will use your last-used background pattern and line-height
Performance improvements with images
Fix bug where the whiteboard would sometimes clear accidentally
Add ballpoint pen
You can now set a note to have college-ruled paper, lined paper, grid paper, or dots
Highlighter strokes now mix when they overlap
Images are now restricted to 1000x1000 pixels for performance
PDF exports now display images (and your background)
UI improvements
Deleting a file is now synced between your devices
Animate images when they're undone/redone
UI improvements
You can now add images to your notes!
Straight lines are now snapped to right angles
Fixed Traditional Chinese not being used, thanks to jhih_yu
Hold down while drawing a line to straighten it
You can now change the pen size
Accidental strokes don't clear your redo stack anymore
When logging in, your encryption password is verified to avoid overwriting your existing notes
Updated app info dialog
Zooming no longer accidentally deletes your last stylus stroke
Various UI improvements
You can now choose to use the Atkinson Hyperlegible font
Updated Simplified Chinese translation by Sdarfeesh
Migrated to non-deprecated Nextcloud package
Use iOS-style switches on the Settings page for iOS/macOS users
Updated Font Awesome 5 to Font Awesome 6 icons
Bug fix for the eraser
Various bug fixes following initial app load
Italian translations by albanobattistella
Updated Chinese translations by Sdarfeesh
New tool: highlighter!
Updated icons including icons from Font Awesome 5
Syncing progress doesn't get stuck before 100% anymore
Spanish translations by mamasch19
Added the missing clear buttons to the whiteboard
Better icon for the eraser
Show a zoom indicator when zooming
Fix font issue with old macOS versions
New notes have better generated names
German translations by mamasch19
Updated Chinese translations by Sdarfeesh
Chinese translations provided by Sdarfeesh
You can pick a custom accent color in settings
Show a button in settings to update your app even if it's not urgent.
The editor overflow menu now closes when you click a button.
Bug fix: the toolbar buttons weren't enabling/disabling as needed (e.g. the undo/redo buttons were always enabled).
Undo/redo has been given a much needed overhaul. You can now undo/redo the eraser as you'd expect.
You can now clear a page (or all pages) using the overflow menu.
You can choose to override your system dark-mode in settings.
Fixed some weirdness when deleting a note.
Support for styluses that have a built-in eraser
Editor toolbar shortcuts are the same but now require the Ctrl button to be pressed as well.

description.p: 1. Add a whiteboard tab to the home screen (use it like you'd use a whiteboard!)
2. The file tree (on desktop/tablet) now stays up to date with file changes
3. Fix a bug for first-time users where the Saber directory can't be watched when it doesn't exist yet
1. Fix syncing not starting when already logged in
2. Fix oversized navbar on Android
1. Fix some Nextcloud URLs being rejected (#13)
2. Add delete buttons to each note on the home screen (#15)
1. Allow SBN export (Saber note format)
2. Virtual filesystem improvements on the web
3. Restart unfinished uploads if needed
1. Allow PDF export
2. Add a setting to disable automatically checking for updates
1. Fix crash in the editor for new users
1. Support for macOS
2. Pen color doesn't reset to black every time, but remembers your last used color
3. Fixed how recently accessed files are recorded
1. Use separate passwords for Nextcloud and encryption. This prevents your Nextcloud provider knowing your encryption key.
1. Stop the syncing indicator infinitely looping if logged out
2. Support Ctrl-Z and Ctrl-Y keyboard shortcuts
3. Various flatpak tweaks
1. Linux theming now works properly
2. Home screen shows syncing progress, and a resync can be manually triggered by pressing the sync button in the corner
3. Syncing is improved under the hood: the latest version of a note is prioritized rather than accidentally overwriting it if you make changes on two devices
